title: The Flame - consistency visualization component
description:
Build The Flame - the core visual metaphor for habit consistency.

## From Vision
"The Flame: Visual representation of consistency. A small ember at 0%, growing to a blazing flame at 100%. It grows quickly with improvement, shrinks slowly with misses. You're never at zero - even a tiny ember means you're still here."

## Visual States
- [ ] 0-10%: Tiny ember, barely visible glow
- [ ] 11-30%: Small flame, warm colors
- [ ] 31-50%: Medium flame, growing
- [ ] 51-70%: Strong flame, vibrant
- [ ] 71-90%: Large flame, intense
- [ ] 91-100%: Blazing flame, full glory

## Component Requirements
- [ ] Animated SVG or Lottie animation
- [ ] Smooth transitions between states
- [ ] Responds to consistency percentage prop
- [ ] Works in light and dark mode
- [ ] Multiple sizes (small for list items, large for detail view)

## Behavior
- [ ] "Grows quickly" - improvement shows immediately
- [ ] "Shrinks slowly" - decline is gradual, forgiving

## Usage Locations
- Today screen: Small flame per habit
- Habit detail screen: Large flame prominently displayed
- Friend profile: Their habit flames

## Design Notes
- Should feel warm, encouraging, alive
- Never completely out - even 0% shows an ember
- Animation should be subtle, not distracting
